2053.subject: ASAP
2053.descrlong: Provides supplemental support for upper-division courses. Students work in small groups with a tutor from the Academic Skills Achievement Program (ASAP), and receive assistance on course assignments, readings, and study skills. Groups meet for 50 to 90 minutes per week. Must be taken concurrently with a course that satisfies the ENGCOM C University Learning Requirement. Credit/no credit only. (Offered every semester.)
